title: Pricey for the value
text: The included in the price continental breakfast set out on each floor allows a quick start in the morning. The OK sized room with large bathroom and large TV screen was fine.The $400 Sunday and $500 Monday reduced room price coupled with a less than bubbly front (trendy) desk staff precludes an "excellent" rating.[The seemingly high room price may have been consistent since room availability in Chicago at time of visit was "nil".]
